explains: adv. 明亮地；鲜明地；生辉地

sentences.en: The sun shone brightly in a cloudless sky.
sentences.cn: 太阳在无云的天空中明亮地照耀着。

sentences.en: All these brightly coloured hybrids are so lovely in the garden.
sentences.cn: 园中所有这些色彩鲜艳的杂交植物真好看。

sentences.en: Sometimes the people doing this dance hold brightly coloured scarves.
sentences.cn: 有时候跳这种舞的人拿着色彩鲜艳的围巾。
